column5: Just wondering how things are on Nipissing and area. We had some nice showers down south of you a couple days ago. I know you didn't have a lot of snow last winter and was wondering how things are shaping up for the opener. Andy
I was up on the weekend on the west side of nipissing and the bugs weren't that bad and the water level was ok also But mind you it was a little windy
I was in north bay on Wednesday and the bugs were BAD anywhere with trees.  Water level looked fine.

Hi Andy. Im on an island on the south bay. Not a bug in sight tonight. Water level is perfect. We had some showers yesterday and this morning so its looking great for the opener. Good luck next weekend!
